General.Name: Keskisuomalainen Oyj A
General.Description: Keskisuomalainen Oyj engages in publishing, printing, and distributing newspapers and magazines in Finland. It also engages in media, digital outdoor advertising, marketing and communication services, research and printing services, distribution, and real estate business. The company was founded in 1871 and is headquartered in Jyväskylä, Finland.
